Title: ​Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai successfully concludes a Special Consular Camp
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai successfully concluded a Special Consular Camp on December 29 and 30, 2021, at the chancery premises. During the camp, 47 birth certificates and 20 citizenship certificates were issued, providing essential services to the community.

Title: Ambassador Prof. Janitha Abeywickrema Liyanage Presents Credentials to President Maia Sandu of Moldova
Summary: Ambassador Prof. Janitha Abeywickrema Liyanage, representing Sri Lanka, presented her Letters of Credence to Moldova's President Maia Sandu on December 22, 2021. She is concurrently accredited to Moldova and assumed her diplomatic duties during the ceremony.

Title: Visit of Ambassador to Saint Petersburg together with the State Minister of Indigenous Medicine Promotion, Rural and Ayurvedic Hospitals Development and Community Health
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage visited Saint Petersburg with a delegation led by State Minister Sisira J. to promote Indigenous Medicine and develop rural Ayurvedic hospitals and community health.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Beijing Celebrates Christmas with Community Members and Chinese Friends
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Beijing celebrated Christmas on 25 December 2021 with over 100 invitees, including community members, Chinese friends, media, and Embassy staff in attendance. The event brought together diverse groups to mark the festive occasion and foster cultural exchange and friendship.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Adventure tourism promoted in Jordan
Summary: Sri Lanka's Embassy in Jordan promoted adventure tourism through an exhibition at the Galleria Mall in Amman on December 27. The event aimed to showcase Sri Lanka's exciting adventure tourism offerings to the Jordanian audience.

Title: SCO Awards Twentieth Anniversary Medal to Ambassador Dr Palitha Kohona
Summary: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona was honored with the Shanghai Cooperation Council's Twentieth Anniversary Medal for his contributions to the organization's development and progress. The award recognizes his significant role in advancing the SCO's goals.

Title: Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai Celebrates Christmas
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai celebrated Christmas on December 21, 2021, at the Chancery premises with a message of peace. The event featured prayers and a message from the Pastor and Chairman.

Title: Celebrating the Rhythm of Christmas –  Celebrations by SLEMB Abu Dhabi, UAE
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi, UAE celebrated Christmas on 22 December 2021 with prayers, carols, and entertainment. The event commenced with a prayer led by the Apostolic Vicar, bringing the festive spirit to attendees.

Title: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage pays a visit to the Head of Rossotrudnichestvo
Summary: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage of Sri Lanka visited the Head of Rossotrudnichestvo, the Federal Agency for the Commonwealth of Independent States Affairs, on December 13, 2021. The meeting aimed to discuss matters related to cooperation between Sri Lanka and Russia.

Title: Encouraging Collaborations and Partnerships in Tourism Promotion: Presentation of NKAR Travel and Tours to the National Association of Independent Travel Agencies (NAITAS)
Summary: NKAR Travel and Tours presented to the National Association of Independent Travel Agencies (NAITAS, showcasing collaborations in tourism promotion with the Embassy of Sri Lanka and the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau at a recent event in Manila. The presentation aimed to foster partnerships and enhance tourism initiatives.

Title: Sri Lanka- Jordan Business Council established under the aegis of the Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan, in collaboration with the Jordanian Businessmen Association and the National Chamber of Exporters of Sri Lanka, established the first-ever Sri Lanka-Jordan Business Council during a virtual webinar.

Title: Ambassador Ameer Ajwad Felicitates Long-Serving Sri Lankan Migrant Worker Leaving Oman after 40 Years
Summary: Ambassador Ameer Ajwad honored Namiq Azhar Mohideen, a long-serving Sri Lankan migrant worker in Oman, as he departs for Sri Lanka after 40 years of service. Mohideen is recognized as one of the most senior members of the Sri Lankan community in Oman.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy Briefs Members of the Recruiting Agents Association in Jordan
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan organized a briefing on December 22 for members of the Recruiting Agents Association (RAA) to enhance job opportunities for Sri Lankans in Jordan. The briefing took place at the premises of the RAA.

Title: Virtual B2B Meetings held between Sri Lankan and Nepali Construction Companies
Summary: Sri Lankan and Nepali construction companies engaged in virtual B2B meetings via Zoom, facilitated by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Nepal and the Export Development Board of Sri Lanka (EDB) on the 21st. Twenty companies participated in the interactive session to explore business opportunities and foster collaboration in the construction sector.

Title: Celebration of Christmas by the Embassy of Sri Lanka Washington DC on 23 December 2021
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington DC celebrated Christmas on December 23, 2021, with a virtual event emphasizing unity, joy, and happiness. The event featured Christmas carols and messages of goodwill to humanity.

Title: Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion in South-East Asia’s Largest Economy, Indonesia
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta, along with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB) and the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (KADIN), hosted a tourism promotional webinar in Indonesia to boost tourism from the country.

Title: Virtual B2B Meeting organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Indonesia to Introduce Sri Lankan Gem Exporters to an Indonesian Company
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta, in partnership with the Export Development Board (EDB) of Sri Lanka, hosted a virtual B2B meeting to introduce four Sri Lankan gem-exporting companies to Tulola Designs, a luxury jewelry company based in Indonesia. This initiative aimed to facilitate business connections and promote Sri Lankan gem exports to Indonesia.

Title: Sixteenth Session of the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage (ICH)
Summary: The sixteenth session of the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage took place online from December 13 to 18, 2021. The Secretary-General of the Sri Lanka National Commission for UNESCO participated in the event.

Title: Christmas Celebrations 2021 at the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon celebrated Christmas 2021 in collaboration with the Sri Lankan Army Peacekeepers at UNIFIL and the Sri Lankan migrant community as part of their Public Diplomacy program. The event aimed to foster cultural exchange and goodwill among participants.

Title: Inscription of the ‘Traditional Craftsmanship of Dumbara Rata Kalala Weaving’ by UNESCO
Summary: UNESCO has inscribed the 'Traditional Craftsmanship of Dumbara Rata Kalala Weaving' from Sri Lanka, known for its hand-made mats used as wall hangings, tapestries, or cushion covers. These mats are crafted in villages like Kalasirigama and Alokagama by a community of skilled artisans. This recognition highlights the cultural significance and craftsmanship of Dumbara Rata Kalala weaving.

Title: Sri Lanka and India discuss ways to promote Bilateral Cultural Relations through the iconic figures of Theri Sanghamitta and Sita of Ramayana
Summary: Sri Lanka and India explored opportunities to strengthen bilateral cultural relations during a meeting between Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India Milinda Moragoda and India's Minister of State for External Affairs. The discussion focused on leveraging the cultural significance of iconic figures like Theri Sanghamitta and Sita from the Ramayana to promote mutual understanding and cooperation between the two nations.

Title: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage presents copies of credentials to the Republic of Belarus
Summary: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage, representing Sri Lanka in Russia and concurrently in Belarus, presented her credentials to Belarus's Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs, Nikolai Borisevich. This formal act solidifies her diplomatic status in Belarus.

Title: ​Estonian President Alar Karis receives Credentials of Sri Lanka’s Envoy
Summary: Estonian President Alar Karis received the Letter of Credence appointing Ambassador Dharshana M. Perera as Sri Lanka’s Envoy to Estonia from President Gotabaya Rajapaksa. The ceremony took place at the Presidential Palace.

Title: ​Donation of Medical Equipment to Sri Lanka
Summary: Hospital Without Borders (HÔpital Sans Frontiéres- HSF/ZZG), a non-profit organization in Belgium, donated Oxygen Concentrators to Sri Lanka in July 2021 to support the country's COVID-19 response efforts. The donation aimed to help address the medical needs during the pandemic.

Title: Golf Tournament organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Oman to mark the 40th Anniversary of Diplomatic Relations features Sri Lanka Tourism promotion
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Oman, in celebration of the 40th Anniversary of Diplomatic Relations, hosted a Golf Tournament at the Ghala Golf Club in Muscat on December 11, 2021. The event featured a Sri Lanka Tourism promotion alongside the tournament activities, highlighting the cultural and tourism offerings of Sri Lanka.

Title: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Malaysia conducted Mobile Consular Services in five different locations in the Malaysian state of Johor on 11 and 12 December, 2021
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Malaysia provided Mobile Consular Services in five locations in Johor on 11 and 12 December 2021. This initiative aimed to assist Sri Lankan nationals, including "overstayers," before the Malaysian Government's amnesty deadline on 31 December 2021.

Title: ​Honorary Consul in Antwerp, Belgium receives Service Extension
Summary: Honorary Consul in Antwerp, Belgium, Monique De Decker-Deprez, received a Service Extension letter from Ambassador of Sri Lanka Grace Asirwatham in Brussels. De Decker-Deprez has been serving in this position for over a specified period.

Title: Welcoming of Sri Lankan Airlines in the Republic of Seychelles
Summary: Sri Lankan Airlines Flight No. UL 707 was welcomed by the High Commissioner for Sri Lanka to the Republic of Seychelles, Srimal Wickremasinghe, on Sunday, December 12, 2021. The flight marked the airline's arrival in the Republic of Seychelles.

Title: Ambassador Rizvi Hassen presents Letters of Credence to President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine
Summary: Ambassador Rizvi Hassen, the Sri Lankan envoy to Ukraine, presented his Letter of Credence to President Volodymyr Zelensky on December 9, 2021, at the Mariinskij Palace in Kyiv. The ceremony marked the official accreditation of Ambassador Hassen to Ukraine.

Title: “Sri Lanka – A Stress-Buster Destination for the Post-Pandemic Traveler”: Sri Lanka Tourism Promoted at the NAITAS Travel Show 2021
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Manila was a featured event partner at the 2021 NAITAS Travel Show, held on December 4-5. The event showcased Sri Lanka as a stress-buster destination for post-pandemic travelers, promoting tourism opportunities in the country.

Title: ​“Ceylon Cinnamon” with “Born in Sri Lanka” Tag Promoted in Melbourne
Summary: A virtual event titled "Born in Sri Lanka – Ceylon Cinnamon" was held in Melbourne last week. The event featured a panel of experts and businessmen promoting the unique qualities of Ceylon Cinnamon.

Title: ​Webinar held to Promote Trade and Investments between Sri Lanka and Kuwait
Summary: A webinar was organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Kuwait, in partnership with the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry (KCCI), the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka (NCCSL), and the Sri Lanka Export Development Board (SLEDB) to promote trade and investments between the two countries. The event aimed to facilitate business opportunities and strengthen economic ties between Sri Lanka and Kuwait.

Title: ​Chinese visitors show interest in exploring Sri Lanka at the Guangzhou International Travel Fair
Summary: Chinese visitors displayed interest in discovering Sri Lanka at the Guangzhou International Travel Fair, where the Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Guangzhou and the Guangdong Scenery International Travel Agency engaged from December 4-6, 2021. The event aimed to promote tourism opportunities and cultural exchanges between the two countries.

Title: ​Sri Lanka’s New High Commissioner to Canada Presents Credentials
Summary: Sri Lanka's new High Commissioner to Canada, Harsha Kumara Navaratne, presented his credentials to Governor General Mary May Simon at a ceremony in Ottawa on December 7th.

Title: ​Ambassador Colonne discusses Economic and Industrial Cooperation with the Minister of Industry Suriya Jungrungreangkit of Thailand
Summary: Ambassador Colonne of Sri Lanka discussed Economic and Industrial Cooperation with Thailand's Minister of Industry, Suriya Jungrungreangkit, on December 7, 2021. The meeting aimed to strengthen bilateral ties and explore opportunities for collaboration between the two countries.

Title: ​The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta and the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka take steps to attract investors in the electric vehicle manufacturing and assembly sector from Indonesia
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta collaborated with the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka to host a virtual meeting with members of the Indonesian Electric Vehicle Industry Association (Periklindo) to discuss investment opportunities in the electric vehicle manufacturing and assembly sector. The aim is to attract investors from Indonesia to participate in this growing industry.

Title: ​ A unique tea meditation to promote Ceylon tea in Frankfurt am Main
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Frankfurt am Main promoted 'Ceylon Tea' during the Christmas season with a unique tea meditation event at the 'Ronnefeld Tea House' in Frankfurt. The event aimed to showcase and highlight the qualities of Ceylon tea to the public.

Title: ​Exhibition-2021 “Ceylon Products-Growing Friendship” & Tea Stakeholders’ Gathering in Tehran
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran, in partnership with the Sri Lanka Tea Board, hosted an Agricultural Export Exhibition-2021 titled "Ceylon Products-Growing Friendship" and a Tea Stakeholders' Gathering in Tehran. The event aimed to promote Sri Lankan agricultural products and strengthen ties between tea stakeholders in both countries.

Title: ​Sri Lanka High Commission in New Delhi honours its long-serving staff members
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in New Delhi honored long-serving staff members by organizing a six-day tour of Sri Lanka for those who have worked for over thirty years. This gesture was a token of appreciation for their dedicated service.

Title: ​Embassy screens Sri Lankan Film in Ankara for the first time
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara, in collaboration with the National Film Corporation of Sri Lanka and the Directorate General of Cinema of Turkey, screened an award-winning Sri Lankan film for the first time in the history of the mission.

Title: Sri Lankan Cuisine is an ‘Exciting Gastronomical Adventure’ says Ambassador Asirwatham in Brussels
Summary: Ambassador Grace Asirwatham of Sri Lanka praised Sri Lankan cuisine as an 'exciting gastronomical adventure' during a speech at a book launch event in Brussels. The book, titled "Lockdown Journeys," features 200 recipes from over 60 countries worldwide.

Title: ​Sri Lankan Gemstones to enter Armenia
Summary: Sri Lankan Gemstones are set to enter Armenia following a virtual B2B meeting facilitated by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Moscow, the National Gem & Jewellery Authority of Sri Lanka, and the Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Armenia, Sargis Tarverdyan. This collaboration aims to strengthen trade relations between the two countries.

Title: ​President Gotabaya Rajapaksa highlights the importance of global action to curb deforestation and use of fossil fuels at the 5th Indian Ocean Conference in Abu Dhabi
Summary: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa emphasized the need for global action to combat deforestation and reduce the use of fossil fuels during his visit to the United Arab Emirates from 3 to 5 December 2021 for the 5th Indian Ocean Conference in Abu Dhabi. His speech at the conference highlighted the importance of addressing environmental challenges on a worldwide scale.

Title: Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa concludes a successful visit to New Delhi
Summary: Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa successfully concluded a two-day official visit to New Delhi at the invitation of Indian Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman. The visit aimed to strengthen economic ties between Sri Lanka and India.

Title: ​Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage presented Credentials to President Vladimir Putin
Summary: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage of Sri Lanka presented her credentials to President Vladimir Putin on December 01, 2021, along with 19 other foreign Ambassadors. This formal ceremony solidified her role as Sri Lanka's Ambassador to the Russian Federation.

Title: ​‘Ceylon Tea’ attracts Chinese visitors to Sri Lanka Stalls at the Tea Exposition in Guangzhou
Summary: Five prominent Sri Lankan tea-manufacturing companies based in China participated in the Tea Exposition in Guangzhou from 25 to 29 November 2021, arranged by the Consulate General of Sri Lanka. The event showcased 'Ceylon Tea' and attracted Chinese visitors to the Sri Lanka stalls, promoting cultural exchange and trade opportunities.

Title: ​Mahinda Samarasinghe assumes duties as the Ambassador- designate of Sri Lanka to the United States of America
Summary: Mahinda Samarasinghe has officially started his role as the Ambassador-designate of Sri Lanka to the United States of America by assuming duties at the Embassy in Washington D.C. on December 2, 2021. He will represent Sri Lanka in diplomatic matters with the United States.

Title: New Premises of the Sri Lanka Consulate General in Toronto ceremonially reopens at 01 Eglinton Ave East, Toronto, ON M4P 3A1
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Toronto has ceremonially reopened at its new premises located at 01 Eglinton Ave East, Toronto, ON M4P 3A1. This relocation was eagerly anticipated and supported by the Sri Lankan expatriate community.

Title: ​High Commissioner Amarasekara calls on the Minister of International Affairs and Cooperation of Botswana
Summary: Sri Lankan High Commissioner for South Africa, Sirisena Amarasekara, visited Botswana and met with Dr. Lem, the Minister of International Affairs and Cooperation. They engaged in bilateral discussions during the visit.

Title: “Sri Lanka Day – 2021” & Book and Cultural Exhibition
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in the Russian Federation, in collaboration with the Russian State Library (RSL), held "Sri Lanka Day – 2021" at the Center for Oriental Literature of the RSL on November 23. The event featured a book and cultural exhibition, showcasing the rich heritage and literature of Sri Lanka.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda seeks greater Defence and Security Cooperation with India
Summary: Sri Lankan High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, discussed enhancing defense and security cooperation with Indian Defence Minister Rajnath Singh in New Delhi. The meeting aimed to explore opportunities for strengthening ties between the two countries in these critical areas.

Title: Sri Lankan Film “Nela” screened in Riyadh
Summary: The Sri Lankan film "Nela," directed by Bennett Rathnayake, was screened on November 28, 2021, as part of the "Ambassador’s Choice: Film Festival" organized by the Embassy of India in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA).

Title: The delegation of ‘South India Powerloom Federation’ successfully concludes the Business Visit to Sri Lanka
Summary: The delegation of the South India Powerloom Federation, representing weaving associations in Southern India, successfully concluded a business visit to Sri Lanka led by Chairman Dr. M. S. Mathivanan on November 22nd.

Title: The Marubeni Corporation of Japan Explores Possibilities of Investing US$ 375 million in the Wind Power Project, Textiles, and EV Industry in Sri Lanka
Summary: The Marubeni Corporation of Japan is considering investing US$375 million in Sri Lanka's Wind Power Project, textiles, and EV industry. The corporation's Executive Management Team for Asia recently visited Sri Lanka to negotiate the investment opportunity for the 200MW Mannar Wind Power Project and met with President Gotabaya Rajap during their visit.

Title: Ambassador Unambuwe presents Credentials to President Pendarovski of the Republic of North Macedonia
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Germany, Manori Unambuwe, presented her Letters of Credence to President Stevo Pendarovski of North Macedonia, officially accrediting her as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary.

Title: Permanent Representative of Sri Lanka Ambassador C. A. Chaminda I. Colonne presents Letters of Credence to the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (UNESCAP)
Summary: Ambassador C. A. Chaminda I. Colonne, the Permanent Representative of Sri Lanka to the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (UNESCAP), presented his Letters of Credence. This formalized his role as Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Thailand and representative to UNESCAP.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Sultanate of Oman Ameer Ajwad plants Sri Lankan fruit sapling at Saara Oasis in Buraimi of Oman to mark the 40th anniversary of diplomatic relations
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Sultanate of Oman, Ameer Ajwad, planted a Sri Lankan fruit sapling at Saara Oasis in Buraimi, Oman, to commemorate the 40th anniversary of diplomatic relations. During his two-day official visit to the Governorate of Al Buraimi on November 21-22, 2021, he engaged in various activities to strengthen bilateral ties.

Title: “Sri Lankan Day – 2021” and Book and Cultural Exhibition
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Russia, in collaboration with the Russian State Library (RSL), organized the "Sri Lanka Day - 2021" event at the Center for Oriental Literature of the RSL on November 23, 2021. The event featured a book and cultural exhibition, showcasing the rich heritage and traditions of Sri Lanka to the Russian audience.

Title: Enhancing Bilateral Cooperation between Sri Lanka and the Philippines through Technical Cooperation and Capacity Building – Training on Tourism Services and Hospitality Management
Summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs - Technical Cooperation Council of the Philippines (DFA-TCCP) is collaborating with the De La Salle-College of Saint Benilde School of Hotel, Restaurant, and Institution Management to enhance bilateral cooperation with Sri Lanka. This partnership includes training programs on tourism services and hospitality management.

Title: High Commissioner Milinda Moragoda meets India’s Deputy National Security Advisor Shri Pankaj Saran
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's Deputy National Security Advisor, Shri Pankaj Saran, on November 27, 2021, at the National Security Council office in New Delhi. The meeting aimed to discuss bilateral security cooperation between the two countries.

Title: Welfare Assistance for the Sri Lankan detainees in Jordan
Summary: As part of the Consular Outreach Programme, Ambassador Shanika Dissanayake visited the Juweidah Detention Centre in Jordan on November 24 to provide welfare assistance to Sri Lankan detainees. The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan is actively supporting its citizens in need.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in London celebrates Deepavali with the participation of British Sri Lankan community
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in London celebrated Deepavali on November 19, 2021, with the British Sri Lankan community, Councillors, and UK Government representatives in attendance at the High Commission premises. The event marked the annual Deepavali celebrations, fostering cultural ties and community spirit.

Title: Sri Lanka and Thailand consolidate Theravada Buddhist ties
Summary: Sri Lanka and Thailand strengthened their Theravada Buddhist ties as the Director General of the National Office of Buddhism in Thailand, Narong Songarom, met with the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Thailand and Permanent Representative to UNESCAP, C.A. Chaminda I. Colonne. The meeting aimed to enhance cooperation and collaboration between the two countries in the realm of Theravada Buddhism.

Title: Sports Friendship Event in Tehran enhanced cooperation in sports with Iran
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran, along with the Iran Wrestling Federation, hosted the Sri Lanka-Iran Sports Friendship Event-2021 in Tehran on November 23, 2021. The event aimed to enhance cooperation in sports between the two countries, fostering a spirit of friendship and collaboration.

Title: ‘Country Statement at the 41st Session of the General Conference’, UNESCO by the Ambassador of Sri Lanka
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Paris, Prof. Kshanika Hirimburegama, delivered the country statement at the 41st Session of the General Conference of UNESCO on November 15, 2021. The video of the statement can be viewed at the provided link.

Title: Developed Countries and Lending Agencies Should Assist Developing Countries:   Sri Lankan Envoy to Brazil at the Global New Economy Forum
Summary: At the Global New Economy Forum in Brazil on November 22, 2021, the Sri Lankan Envoy emphasized the need for developed countries and lending agencies to support developing nations. Over 150 experts, policymakers, business leaders, politicians, and diplomats participated in the virtual inaugural session.

Title: High Commissioner Sirisena Amarsekara  is Delighted over the Performance of the Sri Lankan Diaspora in Botswana
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to South Africa, Sirisena Amarsekara, expressed delight over the performance of the Sri Lankan diaspora in Botswana during a recent visit for the Credential ceremony. The visit aimed to strengthen ties between the Sri Lankan High Commission in South Africa and Botswana.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda visits headquarters of HCL Technologies, just days ahead of the inauguration of the new facility of the global giant in Sri Lanka
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, visited the headquarters of HCL Technologies in Noida, Uttar Pradesh on November 22. The 50-acre campus, housing 25,000 employees, was toured just days before the inauguration of the company's new facility in Sri Lanka.

Title: Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to Chennai paid a Courtesy Call on the Governor of Tamil Nadu
Summary: The Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to Chennai, Dr. D. Venkateshwaran, paid a courtesy call on the Governor of Tamil Nadu, R. N. Ravi, at the Raj Bhavan on 16.11.2021. During the meeting, the Deputy High Commissioner discussed matters of mutual interest with the Governor.

Title: “Hello Again” momentum created in Brussels to promote Sri Lanka Tourism
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels held a workshop at the Official Residence on November 18, 2021, to promote the reopening of Sri Lanka for international tourism. The objective was to convey the message that Sri Lanka is welcoming tourists again, generating momentum for the "Hello Again" campaign.

Title: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr Palitha Kohona participates in the International Jewellery Summit held in Shanghai
Summary: Dr. Palitha Kohona, the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China, served as a keynote speaker at the International Jewellery Summit held alongside the China International Import Expo 2021 in Shanghai. The summit provided a platform for discussions on the jewelry industry's trends and opportunities.

Title: Sri Lanka makes a remarkable presence at the Hospitality Qatar – 2021 in Doha
Summary: Sri Lanka showcased its presence at the "Destination Pavilion" during Hospitality Qatar 2021 in Doha, held from November 8 to 11, 2021. The event took place at the Doha Exhibition and Convention Centre, marking Sri Lanka's significant participation in Qatar's premier international hospitality and HORECA event.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr Palitha Kohona visits Unisa Palace (Foding) Temple in Nanjing
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China, Dr. Palitha Kohona, visited the impressive Unisa Palace (Foding) Temple in Nanjing, which was constructed from 2012 to 2015 to enshrine the Buddha's skull bone relic, costing 5 billion yuan. The temple is a significant cultural and religious site, showcasing intricate architecture and historical importance.

Title: Sri Lanka, the next holiday destination for Australian tourists promoted in Melbourne
Summary: Kimarli Fernando, Chairperson of the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotions Bureau (SLTPB), invited Australian tourists to visit Sri Lanka and encouraged tour operators in Victoria, South Australia, and Tasmania to promote the destination. Sri Lanka is being promoted as the next holiday hotspot for Australian travelers, with efforts focused on attracting visitors from these regions.

Title: Ambassador N.L Godfrey Cooray presents Credentials to the President of Iceland
Summary: Ambassador N.L. Godfrey Cooray presented his Letter of Credence to President Guðni Th. Jóhannesson of Iceland at a ceremony on November 10, 2021, in Reykjavík. The event took place at the President's office, accrediting him as the ambassador.

Title: Hisense and Haier Biomedical Encouraged to Establish Plants in Sri Lanka
Summary: Hisense and Haier Biomedical have been encouraged to set up plants in Sri Lanka. The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China visited Qingdao to witness the signing of a letter of intent for sister city relations and was invited to the head offices of the companies. This move aims to boost economic cooperation between the countries.

Title: Kandy and Qingdao sign a letter of intent for an agreement on establishing sister city relations
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona visited Qingdao on November 15, 2021, to witness the signing of a letter of intent between Qingdao and Kandy, establishing sister city relations. The agreement aims to foster friendly and cooperative ties between the two cities.

Title: Further strengthening people-to-people contacts Sri Lanka High Commission in New Delhi presents a Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the Jama Masjid of Delhi
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in New Delhi presented a Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the Jama Masjid of Delhi today to enhance people-to-people ties with India. The Quran will be permanently displayed at the mosque, further promoting cultural exchange between the two nations.

Title: Interactive session between the Indian Merchants Chamber of Commerce & Industry and the Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai and the Indian Merchant’s Chamber (IMC) held an interactive session on November 9, 2021, at the auditorium. The session brought together committee members of the IMC and Mission officials for discussions and collaboration.

Title: SL Mission in South Africa is to strengthen the Relations with Namibia
Summary: The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka, Sirisena Amarasekara, recently met with the High Commissioner of Namibia to South Africa, Veiccoh K Nghiwete, to strengthen relations. Namibia is one of the nine countries accredited to the Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa. This meeting aims to enhance diplomatic ties between the two nations.

Title: Acting Consul General meets Consul Generals of Asian Countries
Summary: The Acting Consul General of Sri Lanka, Mr. T.F.M. Aashiq, recently met with Consul Generals from Asian countries including Mr. Syed Muhammad Raziff Aljunied of Singapore, Mr. Alauddin bin Mohd Nor of Malaysia, and Mr. Eko Hartono of Indonesia. This meeting aimed to strengthen diplomatic ties and foster collaboration among the represented nations.

Title: Sri Lankan Gems Promoted in Russia
Summary: Sri Lankan gems were promoted in Russia through a B2B virtual meeting organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Moscow, in partnership with the National Gem and Jewellery Authority of Sri Lanka and the Russian Club of Jewellery Trade.

Title: Official visit of the Minister of Industries to Indonesia
Summary: Minister of Industries Wimal Weerawansa visited Indonesia to attend the 02nd Regional Conference on Industrial Development (RCID) in Jakarta on November 10-11, 2021. The conference aimed to discuss industrial development in the region.

Title: Destination Sri Lanka presented at TNM – Sweden’s premier Tourism event
Summary: Sri Lanka Tourism and the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Stockholm showcased 'Destination Sri Lanka' at the Travel News Market (TNM), Sweden's premier tourism event on November 11 at the Stockholm Waterfront Cong.

Title: Queen Margrethe II receives Credentials of Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Kingdom of Denmark
Summary: Queen Margrethe II of Denmark received Ambassador Dharshana M. Perera's Letters of Credence accrediting him as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Denmark. The ceremony took place on Friday, formalizing his role as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary.

Title: 25 Sri Lanka Companies participate in the 4th Shanghai CIIE
Summary: 25 Sri Lankan companies participated in the 4th Shanghai CIIE, which concluded successfully on November 10, 2021. Organizers reported tentative deals worth around USD 70.72 billion for the purchase of goods.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India Moragoda seeks greater cooperation in the civil aviation sector with India
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's Civil Aviation Minister, Shri Jyotirad, to discuss enhancing cooperation in the civil aviation sector. Moragoda seeks to strengthen ties between the two countries in this important industry.

Title: Visit to Mediterranean Region, Province of Isparta, Burdur and Antalya
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador to Ankara, M.R. Hassen, visited the Mediterranean Region of Turkey to explore opportunities for establishing relations and boosting trade, investment, and tourism links. The visit aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries and promote collaboration in various sectors.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda and the President of the Indian Council for Cultural Relations discuss further enhancing bilateral cultural relations
Summary: Sri Lankan High Commissioner to India Milinda Moragoda met with the President of the Indian Council for Cultural Relations (ICCR), Dr. Vinay Sahasrabuddhe, on Wednesday to discuss enhancing bilateral cultural relations. The meeting aimed to explore ways to strengthen cultural ties between the two countries.

Title: Acting Consul General meets Consul’s General of Republic of Korea and  Russian Federation in Jeddah
Summary: The Acting Consul General T.F.M. Aashiq met with the Consul General of the Republic of Korea, Byoung Jin Han, and the Consul General of the Russian Federation, Yusup Abakarov, in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia on October 11, 2021. The meeting aimed to strengthen diplomatic relations between the countries.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to South Africa  Amarasekara, Presents Credentials to  the President of the Republic of Botswana
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to South Africa, Sirisena Amarasekara, presented his credentials to President Mokgweetsi Eric Keabetswe Masisi of Botswana. He will serve as Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to Botswana in Ga.

Title: “Soo Chai”, New Ceylon Tea Brand launched in Oman
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Oman, Ameer Ajwad, introduced the new Ceylon Masala Tea brand, "Soo Chai," at the National Bank of Oman (NBO) auditorium in Muscat on November 10, 2021. The launch event showcased the unique flavors of Ceylon Masala tea to the audience.

Title: Japanese Outbound Tour Operators were connected directly with Sri Lankan Inbound Tour Operators and Hoteliers Through a Webinar organized by Sri Lanka Mission in Tokyo
Summary: Japanese Outbound Tour Operators were directly connected with Sri Lankan Inbound Tour Operators and Hoteliers through a webinar organized by the Sri Lanka Mission in Tokyo. The event, in collaboration with Sri Lankan Airlines and Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, facilitated live interaction between over 265 participants from Japan and Sri Lanka, promoting tourism partnerships.

Title: Sri Lanka food companies participate in 2021 Guangzhou World Agriculture exposition
Summary: Sri Lankan food companies, represented by agents based in China, participated in the 2021 Guangzhou World Agriculture exposition from 8-9 November 2021. The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Guangzhou facilitated their involvement in the event, showcasing Sri Lanka's food industry.

Title: Frankfurt meets Sri Lanka: a dialogue on vibrant it ecosystems
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Frankfurt am Main organized a webinar titled "Frankfurt meets Sri Lanka on Vibrant IT Ecosystems" in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Export Development Board and FrankfurtRhei. The webinar aimed to facilitate a dialogue on vibrant IT ecosystems between Frankfurt and Sri Lanka, showcasing opportunities for collaboration and growth in the tech sector.

Title: Office of Honorary Consulate of Sri Lanka inaugurated in Antalya, Turkey
Summary: The Office of the Honorary Consulate of Sri Lanka in Antalya, Turkey was inaugurated in Alanya, Antalya province on November 6, 2021. The ceremony was attended by the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Turkey.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi Celebrates Deepavali – Festival of Lights
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi celebrated Deepavali, the "Festival of Lights," on November 8, 2021, at its premises. The event was attended by a limited number of Hindu devotees from the Sri Lankan Hindu community. The celebration marked a joyous occasion for those present.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Germany continues its’ support to the Agri Export Community
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Germany continues to support the Agri Export Community by organizing webinars in collaboration with the Import Promotion Desk. The recent webinar marked the 4th in the series, aiming to empower Sri Lanka's Agri Exporting community.

Title: “Taste of Sri Lanka” in Antalya
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Ankara, Turkey organized the "Taste of Sri Lanka" event at the "My Asia Restaurant" in Antalya Beach Park on November 5, 2021, to showcase Sri Lankan cuisine and promote the country. The event aimed to introduce the flavors of Sri Lanka to visitors in Antalya.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi Celebrates Deepavali – Festival of Lights
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi celebrated Deepavali, the "Festival of Lights," on November 8, 2021, at its premises. The event was attended by a limited number of Hindu devotees from the Sri Lankan Hindu community. It was a joyous celebration of the cultural and religious significance of Deepavali.

Title: Annual Katina Ceremony at Embassy of Sri Lanka in Vienna, Austria
Summary: The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Vienna, Austria conducted the annual Katina ceremony on October 26, 2021, including a Heel Danaya (morning almsgiving) to the Maha Sangha. The almsgiving was a significant part of the ceremony, demonstrating respect and tradition.

Title: MTC Exotic Supermarket chain promotes new products from Sri Lanka
Summary: On Saturday, 6 November 2021, Ambassador Majintha Jayesinghe inaugurated the new outlet of MTC Exotic Supermarket in Vienna, promoting new products from Sri Lanka. The supermarket chain's expansion aims to showcase a variety of products from Sri Lanka to customers in Vienna.

Title: Ambassador Prof Kshanika Hirimburegama presented Credentials to  Co-Prince of Andorra Joan-Enric Vives I Sicilia
Summary: Ambassador Prof Kshanika Hirimburegama presented her credentials to Co-Prince of Andorra Joan-Enric Vives I Sicilia at a ceremony on November 5, 2021, at the Episcopal Palace-La Seu d’Urgell.

Title: Ambassador Manori Unambuwe Presents Credentials to the President of the Republic of Montenegro
Summary: Ambassador Manori Unambuwe presented her Letters of Credence to President Milo Đukanović of Montenegro at the Presidential Palace in Cetinje, officially accrediting her as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary. This formal ceremony solidifies her role as the ambassador representing her country in Montenegro.

Title: 25 Sri Lankan companies exhibit their products at the 4th China International Import Expo 2021 (CIIE)
Summary: 25 Sri Lankan companies are showcasing their products at the 4th China International Import Expo 2021 (CIIE) in Shanghai. President Xi Jinping virtually addressed the formal high-level opening of the event.

Title: The Royal Audience and the Presentation of the Letter of Credence  by Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Thailand C.A. Chaminda I. Colonne to the King Maha Vajiralongkorn Phra Vajiraklaochaoyuhua of the Kingdom of Thailand
Summary: Ambassador C.A. Chaminda I. Colonne of Sri Lanka presented his Letter of Credence to King Maha Vajiralongkorn of Thailand during a Royal Audience. The King graciously received the Ambassador as the official representative of Sri Lanka in Thailand.

Title: Opportunities are Vast for Sri Lankan Exporters in Brazil and South America : Sri Lankan Envoy
Summary: Sri Lankan exporters have vast opportunities in Brazil and South America, as highlighted by the Sri Lankan Envoy. A webinar titled 'Doing Business with Brazil' was organized on November 4, 2021, by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brazil in collaboration with the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce and São Paulo Chamber of Commerce. This event aimed to facilitate business interactions and promote trade relations between the two countries.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka India Moragoda seeks enhanced  economic cooperation with India
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's Finance and Corporate Affairs Minister, Nirmala Sitharaman, to discuss enhancing economic cooperation between the two countries. Moragoda seeks ways to further strengthen economic ties with India.

Title: Newly appointed Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Thiruvananthapuram  receives the Commission of Appointment
Summary: The newly appointed Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Thiruvananthapuram, Bijumon Karnan, received his Commission of Appointment from the High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India, Milinda Moragoda, on November 3rd.

Title: Katina pooja concludes at Sri Lanka Maha Viharaya in Lumbini
Summary: The Katina pooja ceremony at Sri Lanka Maha Viharaya in Lumbini concluded on 31 October 2021. The event saw the participation of the Maha Sangha representing all Buddhist traditions.

Title: Fostering friendship and people-to-people ties through religious diplomacy: Sri Lanka promoted at the Feast Day of the National Shrine of St. Jude Thaddeus in Manila
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Manila participated in a country promotion event at the Feast Day of the National Shrine of St. Jude Thaddeus in Manila, fostering friendship and people-to-people ties through religious diplomacy. The event was held at the invitation of Parish Priest and the Rector of the Shrine, Rev. Fr. Lino Nicasio SVD.

Title: Sri Lankan Envoy to Saudi Arabia Presents Copies of Credentials
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador designate P.M. Amza presented copies of credentials to Saudi Arabia's Deputy Minister for Protocol Affairs Khalid bin Faisal Al Sihly on November 2, 2021, at the Ministry. This formal presentation marks the official recognition of Amza's role as Sri Lanka's envoy to Saudi Arabia.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in INTRAFOOD trade fair in Belgium
Summary: Sri Lanka showcased Ceylon tea, spices, and coconut-based products at the 8th edition of the INTRAFOOD trade fair in Belgium. The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Belgium, in collaboration with the Export Development Board, promoted these products to attendees. Sri Lanka's participation aimed to highlight the country's rich agricultural offerings on the international stage.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Oman launches a Community Outreach Forum named “Talk with the Ambassador”
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Oman has launched a community outreach forum called "Talk with the Ambassador" to engage with the Sri Lankan expatriate community. This initiative aims to foster communication and address the needs of the community.

Title: Deepavali Celebrations in Chennai
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission celebrated Deepavali on October 22, 2021, at the Chancery premises in Chennai. Deepavali is widely celebrated in Sri Lanka and India as a festival that commemorates triumph and joy. The event marked a festive celebration of cultural significance and unity.

Title: SCODA pavilion in Qindao to highlight Sri Lanka products
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona attended the 2021 Shanghai Organisation Financial Cooperation and Capital Market Development Forum in Jiaozhou, Qingdao from October 27-28, 2021. The SCODA pavilion at the event showcased Sri Lankan products to highlight the country's offerings.

Title: Ambassador – designate of Sri Lanka to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia assumes duties
Summary: Ambassador-designate Pakeer Amza assumed duties at the Sri Lankan Embassy in Riyadh on October 31, 2021. The ceremony was organized by the embassy staff.

Title: Sri Lanka highlights the resilient measures taken to overcome the economic and financial challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Sri Lanka showcased resilient measures to tackle economic challenges during the COVID-19 pandemic at the third session of the UNESCAP Committee on Macroeconomic Policy, Poverty Reduction, and Financing for Development. The meeting was held virtually.

Title: Sri Lanka Tourism and Destination Promoted in the Islamic Republic of Iran
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau and the Sri Lanka Foreign Ministry, held a tourism promotion event called "Destination Sri Lanka" at its Chancery. The event aimed to showcase Sri Lanka as a travel destination to the audience in the Islamic Republic of Iran.

Title: China National Vehicles Import and Export Co. Ltd, to invest in Vehicle Plant in Sri Lanka
Summary: China National Vehicles Import and Export Co. Ltd plans to invest in a vehicle plant in Sri Lanka. The Vice President of China National Machinery Import and Export Corp, Wu Yi, met with the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China, Dr. Palitha Kohona, on October 26, 2021, to discuss this potential investment.

Title: China-Sri Lanka Economic, Trade, Cultural Cooperation and Exchange Conference Explores Investment, Trade and Tourism Industries
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Beijing, in collaboration with the China-Sri Lanka Chamber of Economic and Trade Cooperation, hosted a conference on October 26 to promote economic, trade, and cultural cooperation between the two countries. The event focused on exploring opportunities in investment, trade, and tourism industries.

Title: Sri Lanka tables a draft Resolution at UNEP on Sustainable Nitrogen Management
Summary: Sri Lanka introduced a draft Resolution on Sustainable Nitrogen Management at the 8th Annual Sub-Committee meeting of the Committee of Permanent Representatives (CPRs) to the United Nations Environment Program (UNEP). The resolution aims to address sustainable nitrogen management practices.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy celebrates Deepawali in Kathmandu
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Kathmandu celebrated Deepawali, known as Tihar in Nepal, on 27 October 2021. Deepawali celebrations in Nepal span five days, starting from 4 November 2021, and are dedicated to various rituals and festivities.

Title: Traditional Sri Lankan Crafts Promotion in Russia
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Russia showcased a collection of traditional Sri Lankan masks to a mobile Club-Museum-Lecture Hall "Traditional Masks and Figures of the World," which tours the country organizing exhibitions. This initiative aims to promote Sri Lankan crafts and culture in Russia.

Title: Central Bank Governor leads the Sri Lanka delegation to the State of Qatar
Summary: Central Bank Governor Ajith Nivard Cabraal led the Sri Lanka delegation to the State of Qatar from 20-22 October 2021. During the visit, the delegation met with Sheikh Abdulla Bin Saoud Al-Th, the Governor of the Central Bank of Qatar. The meeting aimed to discuss economic cooperation and strengthen ties between the two countries.

Title: Launch of the Special Issue on Sri Lanka of Viet Nam Journal of Indian and South Asian Studies
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam, along with the Vietnam Institute for Indian and Southwest Asian Studies (VIISAS) and Viet Nam Academy of Social Sciences (VASS), recently launched a Special Issue on Sri Lanka in the Viet Nam Journal of Indian and South Asian Studies.

Title: State Minister of Regional Cooperation meets MEDEF International France to invite French Investors to Sri Lanka
Summary: State Minister of Regional Cooperation Tharaka Balasuriya visited France from 04-08 October 2021 to meet with MEDEF International France and invite French investors to Sri Lanka. During the visit, the State Minister participated in various events organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in France. This initiative aims to strengthen economic ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka welcomes French direct investments in development project tourism & hospitality Sectors
Summary: Sri Lanka welcomed French direct investments in development projects in the tourism and hospitality sectors during high-level discussions in Paris from 05-11 October 2021. State Minister of Regional Cooperation Tharaka Balasuriya and Chairman BOI Sanjaya Mohottala led the bilateral meetings, aiming to boost cooperation between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka participates at IFTM TOP RESA Paris from 05-08 October 2021, Europe’s Largest Travel Fair
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in IFTM TOP RESA Paris, Europe's largest travel fair, held from 5-8 October 2021 at Porte de Versailles. IFTM TOP RESA is a multi-target professional fair for tourism and travel industry professionals. The event showcased a wide range of offerings in the travel sector.

Title: ‘Launch to Germany’- Virtual Soft-landing Program for Sri Lanka Startups
Summary: The 'Launch to Germany' Virtual Soft-landing Program for Sri Lankan startups took place at the AsiaBerlin Summit 2021 in Berlin, aiming to help these startups enter the German market. The competition provided a platform for startups to pitch their ideas and establish connections in Germany.

Title: The Luoyang Municipal Government Gifts a Peony Garden to the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Beijing
Summary: The Luoyang Municipal Government has gifted a peony garden to the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Beijing following a visit by Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona during the Peony Festival in April. The gift was presented by the Foreign Affairs Office of the Luoyang Municipal People’s Government.

Title: Sri Lanka Felicitated at Innovative International Film Festival, Bangalore – 2021
Summary: Sri Lanka was honored at the 2021 Innovative International Film Festival in Bangalore, showcasing efforts to enhance its film industry globally. The event was organized by the Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai and the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, marking a significant milestone for the country's cinema sector.

Title: Minister Namal Rajapaksa Participates at the inauguration of T20 Cricket World Cup 2021 in Oman as Special Guest
Summary: Sri Lankan Minister Namal Rajapaksa attended the inauguration of the T20 Cricket World Cup 2021 in Oman as a special guest. He represented Sri Lanka at the event, showcasing support for the tournament.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission pays an official visit to the Natural History Museum in London
Summary: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to the UK, Saroja Sirisena, and the staff of the Sri Lanka High Commission in London visited the Natural History Museum in London on October 15, 2021. The visit was official and aimed to strengthen cultural ties between Sri Lanka and the UK. It provided an opportunity for the delegation to explore the museum's exhibits and engage in cultural exchange.

Title: Consulate General promotes Sri Lanka Tourism in the Northeast of the Federal State of Hessen
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Frankfurt am Main held a Tourism Promotion Event on October 7, 2021, as part of its Economic Diplomacy activities in the northeast of Hessen. The event was well attended, aiming to promote Sri Lanka tourism in the region.

Title: Sri Lanka showcased for the first time at the 2021 China-ASEAN Expo Tourism Exhibition, Guilin, Guangxi Province
Summary: Sri Lanka was showcased for the first time at the 2021 China-ASEAN Expo Tourism Exhibition in Guilin, Guangxi Province. The Consulate of Sri Lanka in Guangzhou participated with a culture and tourism booth from October 15-17, 2021, marking a significant presence in the event.

Title: Representative of Sri Lanka to the State of Palestine Nawalage Bennet Cooray  presents Credentials to the President of the State of Palestine
Summary: Sri Lanka's Representative to the State of Palestine, Nawalage Bennet Cooray, presented his Letter of Credence to the President of the State of Palestine on October 14, 2021, at the Presidential Palace in Ramallah. This formalized his role as Sri Lanka's official representative to Palestine.

Title: Ambassador of  Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona visits KE Electric in Shijiazhuang and urges investing in Solar Power in Sri Lanka
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona visited KE Electric in Shijiazhuang, urging investments in solar power in Sri Lanka. The China National Energy Engineering and Construction Company Limited (CNEE) has offered to invest USD 800 million in 400 MW renewable energy projects in Sri Lanka, providing equipment and expertise for the initiatives. This investment aims to boost the development of solar power in Sri Lanka.

Title: State Minister of Regional Cooperation Tharaka Balasooriya and State Minister of Foreign Employment Promotion and Market Diversification Priyankara Jayarathna visit the State of Qatar
Summary: State Minister of Regional Cooperation Tharaka Balasooriya and State Minister of Foreign Employment Promotion and Market Diversification Priyankara Jayarathna led a Sri Lankan delegation on a visit to the State of Qatar.

Title: High Commissioner designate of Sri Lanka to Canada calls on the Chief of Protocol of Canada
Summary: High Commissioner-designate of Sri Lanka to Canada, Harsha Kumara Navaratne, met with the Chief of Protocol of Canada, Stewart Wheeler, in Ottawa on October 15, 2021, after arriving in Canada on October 14, 2021. The meeting took place to discuss diplomatic matters and strengthen bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: High Commissioner- designate of Sri Lanka to Canada assumes duties
Summary: Harsha Kumara Navaratne, the newly appointed High Commissioner-designate of Sri Lanka to Canada, assumed his duties at the Sri Lanka High Commission in Ottawa on October 15, 2021. He was warmly received upon arrival at the High Commission.

Title: Sri Lankan literature donated to New Zealand
Summary: A collection of books in Sinhala and Tamil languages was donated to the Community Languages section of the City Library in Palmerston North, New Zealand on 24 September 2021. The books were officially handed over, enriching the library's literary offerings with Sri Lankan literature.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona calls for more high tech collaboration between Chinese and Sri Lankan companies at the thematic forum of Digital Culture and Finance Industry of the Taihu World Cultural Forum, Benbu, Anhui
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona emphasized the need for increased high-tech collaboration between Chinese and Sri Lankan companies at the Taihu World Cultural Forum in Bengbu, Anhui. The forum, themed "Mutual Learning," took place at Bengbu Ancient Dwelling Expo Park on October 12, 2021.

Title: Embassy donates replica of Samadhi Buddha statue to new temple in Kathmandu
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka donated a five-foot-tall replica of the Samadhi Buddha statue to the Venerable Maha Sangha at the newly established Shri Ashta Saddharmayatan Vihar in Lalitpur. The donation took place during a special ceremony at the temple in Kathmandu.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in the world’s leading Anuga trade fair in cologne from 9 to 13 October, 2021
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in the Anuga trade fair in Cologne from October 9 to 13, 2021, marking its presence in the global food and beverages industry. Anuga is known as the world's leading business platform for this sector.

Title: King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden receives Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Sweden in Solemn Audience
Summary: King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden received Ambassador Dharshana M. Perera of Sri Lanka at a formal Solemn Audience at the Royal Palace in Stockholm on October 12, 2021. The meeting aimed to strengthen diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: Ceylon Tea represented at Anuga 2021
Summary: Sri Lanka showcased its renowned Ceylon Tea at Anuga 2021, the world’s largest trade fair for the food and beverage industry in Cologne, Germany, from 9 to 13 October 2021. The event, organized under a one-roof concept, provided a platform for Sri Lankan tea producers to engage with international buyers and industry professionals.

Title: Sri Lanka and Maldives to Enhance Cooperation in Shipbuilding and Boatbuilding Industries
Summary: Sri Lanka and Maldives are set to enhance cooperation in shipbuilding and boatbuilding industries. A virtual meeting between the National Boating Association of Maldives (NBAM) and the Representatives of the Sri Lanka Boat and Ship Building Industry was hosted by the Foreign Ministry in collaboration with the Export. The meeting aimed to strengthen ties and promote collaboration between the two countries in these sectors.

Title: “HI Japan” Trade Exhibition Promoting Sri Lankan Coconut Products
Summary: The "HI Japan" Trade Exhibition featured a Sri Lankan booth showcasing coconut products, organized by the Sri Lanka Mission in Japan and supported by the Coconut Development Authority (CDA). The Ambassador and Mission staff actively participated in promoting these products, highlighting Sri Lanka's presence in the event.

Title: Sri Lanka and Nepal underline longstanding friendship and bilateral cooperation
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Nepal, Himalee Arunatilaka, conveyed felicitations from Sri Lankan Foreign Minister Prof. G.L. Peiris to Nepal's new Foreign Minister Dr. Narayan Khadka, emphasizing the longstanding friendship and bilateral cooperation between the two countries. This meeting highlights the continued commitment to strengthen ties and enhance cooperation between Sri Lanka and Nepal.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Brazil Sumith Dassanayake presents Credentials to the President of Brazil
Summary: Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake of Sri Lanka presented his Letters of Credence to President Jair Bolsonaro at the Palácio Do Planalto in Brasilia. Dassanayake is the newly appointed Ambassador to Brazil, representing Sri Lanka in the Federative Republic of Brazil.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India Milinda Moragoda calls on India’s National Security Advisor Shri Ajit Doval
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, visited India's National Security Advisor Shri Ajit Doval on October 8, 2021, at his office in New Delhi. The meeting was a courtesy call to discuss matters of mutual interest and strengthen bilateral relations.

Title: Ceylon Tea promotion at the International Bazaar of the Diplomatic Club Syria
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon and the Sri Lanka Tea Board showcased Ceylon Tea and handicrafts at the International Bazaar in Damascus on October 9th as part of the Economic Diplomacy programme. The event aimed to promote Ceylon Tea to visitors and enhance diplomatic relations between the countries.

Title: Webinar on setting forth MICE Tourism of Sri Lanka and India
Summary: A webinar was organized by the Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Convention Bureau (SLCB) to promote MICE tourism in Sri Lanka and India. The event aimed to showcase Sri Lanka as a tourism destination in the Western region of India.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Oman arranged donation of ICU beds to treat COVID Patients in Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Oman coordinated the donation of ICU beds to aid in treating COVID patients in Sri Lanka. The initiative was led by the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Oman, Ameer Ajwad, with support from the Sri Lankan community and banking professionals in Oman. The donated ICU beds will help enhance healthcare facilities in Sri Lanka during the pandemic.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission organises a Ceylon Tea tasting session at the Royal Hospital Chelsea
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in London organized a Ceylon tea tasting session at the Royal Hospital Chelsea to show appreciation for the service of British Army veterans. The event was a gesture of goodwill towards the iconic veterans, highlighting the rich tradition of Ceylon tea.

Title: ‘Sri Lanka towards a start up friendly nation’- Sri Lanka Embassy at AsiaBerlin Summit 2021 in Berlin
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Germany, along with Enpact, ICTA, and Hatch, organized events during the Embassy Day of the AsiaBerlin Summit 2021 in Berlin. The initiative aimed to promote Sri Lanka as a startup-friendly nation, fostering collaboration and innovation in the tech sector.

Title: Minister Namal Rajapaksa induces new dynamism into Sri Lanka – Kenya bilateral relations
Summary: Minister Namal Rajapaksa visited Kenya to enhance bilateral relations, bringing new dynamism to Sri Lanka-Kenya ties. During the two-day official visit, he held discussions on sports, youth development, and digital technology, aiming to strengthen cooperation between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka encourages South Indian weavers to invest in Sri Lanka
Summary: Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai, in collaboration with Tamilnadu Powerlooms Federation, organized a trade and investment delegation on October 6, 2021. The objective was to encourage South Indian weavers to invest in Sri Lanka, fostering bilateral cooperation and economic growth in the textile industry.

Title: Tourism reenergized with SriLankan Airlines starting direct flights between Colombo and Kathmandu
Summary: SriLankan Airlines has launched direct flights between Colombo and Kathmandu, boosting tourism between Sri Lanka and Nepal. This new air route has been well received by the tourism industries in both countries, removing a significant barrier to promoting travel between the two nations.

Title: The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to the Republic of Seychelles discusses with the Minister of Transport Anthony Derjacques, regarding opportunities for transport sector in Seychelles
Summary: The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to the Republic of Seychelles, Srimal Wickremasinghe, met with Seychelles Minister of Transport Anthony Derjacques on October 1, 2021. They discussed opportunities for the transport sector in Seychelles, aiming to enhance collaboration and development in this area.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jordan celebrates International Children’s Day at SOS Children’s Village in Jordan
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jordan celebrated International Children’s Day on October 1 by visiting children at the SOS Children’s Village in Tabarbour, Jordan. The Ambassador and staff engaged with the children during the visit, fostering a meaningful connection with the community.

Title: Sri Lanka Mission in Japan Facilitates “Laksala Handicrafts” to Franchise in Japan
Summary: Sri Lanka Mission in Japan facilitated Laksala Handicrafts in signing a Master Franchise Agreement with Sala Enterprises on Wednesday, October 6, 2021. The mission played a key role in identifying three initial franchise candidates. This agreement paves the way for Laksala Handicrafts to expand its presence in Japan.

Title: Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage assumes duties as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia
Summary: Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage has officially started his role as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia after a ceremony at the Embassy on October 4, 2021.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Belgium Asirwatham Calls on Secretary General of the European External Action Service (EEAS) of the EU
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Belgium, Grace Asirwatham, met with Secretary General of the European External Action Service (EEAS) Stefano Sannino in Brussels. The meeting was a courtesy call to discuss matters of mutual interest between Sri Lanka and the European Union.

Title: Sri Lanka Pavilion at  EXPO 2020 in Dubai is Declared Open
Summary: The Sri Lanka Pavilion at EXPO 2020 in Dubai was officially opened with the presence of the Consul General of Sri Lanka to Dubai and Northern Emirates, Nalinda Wijerathna, and the Chief International Participant Officer of EXPO 2020, Omar Shehadeh.

Title: Ambassador visits the Free and Hanseatic city of Bremen
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador to Germany, Manori Unambuwe, visited the Free and Hanseatic City of Bremen on September 23-24, 2021, to enhance friendly relations. Bremen, a federal state, holds a significant position in fostering diplomatic ties.

Title: Our Goal is One Million Chinese Tourists to Sri Lanka
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona, speaking at the Innovation and Development of Cities Summit, encouraged Chinese tour groups to direct their focus towards visiting Sri Lanka. The goal is to attract one million Chinese tourists to the country.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona meets Chinese media to promote the CIIE Sri Lanka Pavilion
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China Dr. Palitha Kohona met with Chinese media at the residence on September 30, 2021, to promote Sri Lanka's participation at the 4th China International Import Expo (CIIE) 2021. The meeting aimed to brief the media on the CIIE Sri Lanka Pavilion.

Title: Promotion of Sri Lankan products and tourism at the Guangdong 1st Century Maritime Silk Road International Exposition
Summary: The Guangdong 21st Century Maritime Silk Road International Exposition 2021 took place from September 24-26 at the Canton Fair complex in Guangzhou. The event was organized by the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade G, focusing on promoting Sri Lankan products and tourism.

Title: Sri Lanka’s ICT/BPM Country Brand the “Island of Ingenuity” Promoted at the ICT Digital Week in Luxembourg
Summary: Sri Lanka's ICT/BPM country brand, the "Island of Ingenuity" (IOI), was promoted at the ICT Digital Week in Luxembourg from September 13 to 17, 2021. The Sri Lanka Export Development Board (EDB) collaborated with the Embassy to showcase the country's innovative capabilities.

Title: Sri Lanka and France to Collaborate in Agroecological transition of Agricultural Systems
Summary: Sri Lanka's State Minister of Coconut, Kithul, and Palmyra Cultivation Promotion, Arundika Fernando, visited France from September 4 to 10 to collaborate on the agroecological transition of agricultural systems. The visit aims to enhance cooperation between the two countries in promoting sustainable agricultural practices.

Title: Enhancing Bilateral Cooperation between Sri Lanka and the Philippines through Technical Cooperation and Capacity Building
Summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs - Technical Cooperation Council of the Philippines (DFA-TCCP) launched a technical and capacity building program for Sri Lankans on Gender Mainstreaming on September 16, 2021. This initiative aims to enhance bilateral cooperation between Sri Lanka and the Philippines through knowledge sharing and skills development.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka Milinda Moragoda meets the Minister of Petroleum and Natural Gas of India Shri Hardeep Singh Puri
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's Minister of Petroleum and Natural Gas, Shri Hardeep Singh Puri, at the Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas in New Delhi. The meeting was a courtesy call between the two officials.

Title: Exploring synergies in strengthening economic cooperation: Sri Lanka showcased at the 30th Mindanao Business Conference
Summary: Sri Lanka was highlighted at the 30th Mindanao Business Conference by Ambassador Shobini Gunasekera, who presented at the invitation of the Philippine Chamber of Commerce and Industry. The event aimed to explore opportunities for enhancing economic cooperation between the two countries.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Riyadh conducts “Hello Again Sri Lanka” awareness webinar for Saudi Tour Operators
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Riyadh organized the "Hello Again Sri Lanka" awareness webinar for Saudi Tour Operators on August 28, 2021. The event was supported by the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, Sri Lanka Foreign Ministry, and Sri Lankan Airlines Office in Saudi Arabia. This initiative aimed to promote tourism and strengthen ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Tea Board Participates at the “World Food Moscow 2021”
Summary: The Tea Promotion Unit (TPU) of the Sri Lankan Embassy in Russia, supported by the Sri Lanka Tea Board, participated in the 30th Jubilee exhibition of food products, "World Food Moscow 2021." The event showcased Sri Lanka's tea offerings to a global audience, promoting the country's renowned tea industry.

Title: Minister of Energy Udaya Gammanpila visits the Islamic Republic of Iran
Summary: Minister of Energy Udaya Gammanpila led a Sri Lankan delegation on a visit to the Islamic Republic of Iran from September 24-27, 2021, upon the invitation of the Iranian Minister of Petroleum. The visit aimed to strengthen bilateral ties between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Islamic Republic of Iran Vipulatheja Wishwanath Aponsu presented Letters of Credence in Iran
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Iran, Vipulatheja Wishwanath Aponsu, presented his Letters of Credence to President Ayatollah Sayyid Ebrahim Raisi at the Sadabad Complex in Iran. The ceremony took place at the Office of the President.

Title: Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai hosts two out bound tour operator delegations
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai recently hosted two outbound tour operator delegations from the Travel Agents Association of India (TAAI) and Travel Agents Federation of India. This event took place following the resumption of tourism for Indian travelers, signaling a positive step towards strengthening tourism ties between the two countries.

Title: Honorary Consulate of Sri Lanka Opened in historical city of Bursa
Summary: The Honorary Consulate of Sri Lanka in Bursa, Turkey officially opened on September 25, 2021. The opening ceremony was attended by the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Turkey, M. Rizvi Hassen, and the Deputy Chairman & Head of Foreign Affairs. This new consulate aims to strengthen diplomatic ties between Sri Lanka and Turkey.

Title: Bursa business community ready to explore Sri Lankan products
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Turkey, M.R. Hassen, invited the Bursa Chamber of Commerce and Industry members to explore Sri Lankan products during a round table meeting. The Bursa business community is ready to engage in exploring opportunities with Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lanka and Thailand hold high-powered talks to explore mutually beneficial investment corridors
Summary: Sri Lanka and Thailand recently engaged in high-level discussions to explore investment opportunities that could benefit both countries. The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Bangkok, along with the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka and China Harbour Engineering Company, collaborated on this initiative. The talks aimed to enhance and expand investment corridors between the two nations.

Title: Collaboration between the Faculties of Management Studies of University of Peradeniya and Ton Duc Thang University of Viet Nam
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam organized a virtual meeting between the Faculties of Management Studies at the University of Peradeniya (UoP) and Ton Duc Thang University (TDTU) in Viet Nam. This collaboration aims to enhance academic exchanges and cooperation between the two institutions.

Title: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China visits the Sinopharm head office and repeats request for a vaccine refilling plant in Sri Lanka
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to China, Dr. Palitha Kohona, and Embassy officials visited Sinopharm's Beijing Institute of Biological Products Co., Ltd. (CNBG) on 23 September 2021. During the visit, they reiterated their request for a vaccine refilling plant in Sri Lanka.

Title: Securing prospective buyers for Sri Lankan products at the 17th China International Small and Medium Enterprises Fair in Southern China
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Guangzhou organized the Sri Lanka country pavilion at the 17th China International Small and Medium Enterprises Fair in Southern China. The pavilion featured 7 Sri Lankan companies based in China to attract potential buyers for Sri Lankan products.

Title: An Awareness Session to Promote Future Tourism Prospects in Sri Lanka to the Outbound Travel Agents in Viet Nam
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam, along with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB) and the Viet Nam Society of Travel Agents (VISTA), conducted a virtual awareness session to boost future tourism prospects in Sri Lanka for outbound travel agents in Viet Nam. This session aimed to promote tourism opportunities and strengthen ties between the two countries.

Title: Promoting SL Boat Industry in Southern Africa
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Pretoria organized an event to promote the Sri Lankan boat industry in Southern Africa in collaboration with the State Ministry of Warehouse Facilities, Container Yards, and Port Supply Facilities.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India Milinda Moragoda presents Credentials to the President of India Shri Ram Nath Kovind
Summary: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India, Milinda Moragoda, appointed with cabinet rank, presented his Letter of Credence to President Shri Ram Nath Kovind of India in New Delhi on the 22nd. This formalized his role as the official representative of Sri Lanka to India.

Title: Ceylon Tea, Spices and Cashew attracts at World Food Istanbul trade fair
Summary: At the World Food Istanbul Trade Fair held from September 9 to 12, 2021, the Sri Lanka stand showcased popular items like Pure Ceylon Tea, authentic Sri Lankan cashew, and spices, attracting a large number of visitors. The exhibition highlighted the quality and appeal of these Sri Lankan products to international audiences.

Title: High Commissioner Amarasekara to capture new opportunities in the Southern African market for IT, Construction, and Textile Industries of Sri Lanka
Summary: Sri Lanka High Commissioner Amarasekara is exploring new opportunities in the Southern African market for the IT, Construction, and Textile industries. Despite COVID-19 measures in South Africa, the High Commission in Pretoria organized virtual meetings with Heads of Mission from concurrently accredited countries. This initiative aims to strengthen bilateral relations and promote economic cooperation between Sri Lanka and Southern African nations.

Title: Kenya is Sri Lanka’s good friend Kananathan tells the Foreign Minister of Kenya
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to Kenya, Velupillai Kananathan, met with Kenyan Foreign Minister Ambassador Raychelle Omamo in Nairobi on September 15, 2021. During the meeting, the Foreign Minister emphasized the strong friendship between Kenya and Sri Lanka.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Moscow facilitates Cooperation between the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka and Ural Chamber of Commerce and Industry of the Russian Federation
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Moscow facilitated an online meeting on 30 August 2021 between the Heads of the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka and the Ural Chamber of Commerce and Industry of the Russian Federation. The meeting aimed to establish a foundation for closer cooperation between the two chambers.

Title: Chinese visitors fascinated by Sri Lanka at the China International Tourism Industry Exposition
Summary: Chinese visitors were captivated by Sri Lanka at the China International Tourism Industry Exposition, where the Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Guangzhou collaborated with Guangdong Scenery International Travel Agency. The event took place from September 10-12, 2021, showcasing the beauty and attractions of Sri Lanka to a wide audience.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Riyadh holds a webinar to promote bilateral trade
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Riyadh, along with the Asharqia Chamber in Dammam, Saudi Arabia, the Export Development Board, and the Foreign Ministry of Sri Lanka, organized a webinar to promote bilateral trade.

Title: Meeting with Aeroflot
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Moscow facilitated a meeting between the visiting delegation from the Ministry of Tourism & Aviation and PJSC Aeroflot of the Russian Federation at Aeroflot's headquarters on September 3, 2021.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the US Aryasinha in farewell calls thanks the US for support extended to Sri Lanka during the COVID Crisis
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the US Ravinatha Aryasinha expressed gratitude to the US for their support during the COVID crisis in a farewell call with Sumona, the Special Assistant to the President and Senior Director for South Asia at the National Security Council, held via Zoom on September 7.

Title: Minister C.B. Ratnayake discusses bilateral cooperation in Kenya
Summary: Minister C.B. Ratnayake, visiting Kenya privately, discussed bilateral cooperation with Kenyan Minister for Wildlife and Tourism Najib Balala on September 14, 2021. He was accompanied by the High Commissioner of Sri Lanka. The meeting aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries.

Title: First “Embassy Cup” Cricket Tournament in Vienna
Summary: The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Austria, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB) and the Austrian Cricket Association, hosted the inaugural "Embassy Cup" Cricket Tournament in Vienna.

Title: Lulu Hypermarkets – launches “Taste of Sri Lanka” across its Branches in the Western Region of KSA
